subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams won her first tournament title since returning to competition, beating Marion Bartoli, 7-5, 6-1, to win the Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif.
snippet: Serena Williams won her first tournament title since returning to competition, beating Marion Bartoli, 7-5, 6-1, to win the Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif.
